chapter.title: Customising contents
chapter.para: This chapter discusses further customisation of the live system.

section.title: Preseeding Debconf questions
section.para: Files in the config/chroot_local-preseed directory are considered to be debconf preseed files and are installed by &live-helper; using debconf-set-selections.
For more information about debconf, please see debconf(7) in the debconf package.
